pageContext.title: A Special MITH *Unconference* DHKeepsOn
pageContext.description_excerpt: In the wake of the United States federal government shutdown of 2013, the National Endowment for the Humanities was unable to hold its annual project directors meeting. But Digital Humanities can't be stopped!  MITH hosted an \*unconference\* and open house on the day the meeting was slated to occur, so that project directors and the public could learn about NEH-funded projects and discuss potential collaborations among attendees.
pageContext.participants: Jennifer Guiliano, Neil Fraistat, Stephanie Sapienza
